thread.title: Travis Scott Drops Surreal ‘Birds in the Trap’ Short Film
thread.title_full: Travis Scott Drops Surreal ‘Birds in the Trap’ Short Film

author: Bianca Giulione
title: Travis Scott Drops Surreal ‘Birds in the Trap’ Short Film
text:
Teasing fans yesterday with an impromptu Instagram video, Houston rapper and fashion icon Travis Scott announced he would drop a short film on Apple music entitled Birds in the Trap on Monday March 13 at the stroke of midnight on the East Coast. Now it has arrived, and it is truly something to behold. 
With close to a billion album streams and a top ten most streaming album of all-time with Apple, we feedin' the streets again TONIGHT! @applemusic, BIRDS IN THE TRAP — a short film Tonight at 9pm PT/12am ET we eat. 🔥🐦🔥🐦🔥🐦 
A post shared by flame (@travisscott) on Mar 13, 2017 at 2:38pm PDT 

Harkening back to his most recent work – Birds in the Trap Sing McKnight – the short film was released to celebrate his album’s achievement of nearly a billion streams, making it to the top ten most streamed albums of all time with Apple. You can check out the 14 minute short film right here . 
Travis shows no signs of slamming on the breaks, having just announced the launch of his new record label Cactus Jack Records last week, collaborating with Helmut Lang on a capsule collection, and working on his third album Astroworld that will drop sometime in 2017.
Check out La Flame’s most recent fiery track with Lil Uzi Vert & Quavo – “Go Off”

Is Travis Scott rap’s new fashion king? Revisit our musings here .

In other music news, Drake’s ‘More Life’ playlist finally has a release date. Get the scoop on that here .
